articles.description: GOOGLE has made an important change to its Search results which will make it easier for the general public to remove personal information including phone numbers, email and home addresses.

articles.author: Katie Davis
articles.title: I found builders digging up my drive without my permission… then they charged ME - The Sun
articles.content:
A DISGRUNTLED homeowner was stunned to find builders digging up his driveway without his permission when he got back from work.
Cameron Haward, from Spondon, Derby, was forced to hire an independent… [+2082 chars]
